analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/5/0x8eb38715604b938812dec25a0a1bc05b4becb9ca.sol:
	Contract GC has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0x8eb38715604b938812dec25a0a1bc05b4becb9ca.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/5/0x8eb38715604b938812dec25a0a1bc05b4becb9ca.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
